nodes.text: The Wehttam were the inhabitants of the planet Wehttam. They spoke the language known as Wehttam.

Although the planet Wehttam plays a significant role in the Black Fleet Crisis series of novels, only Before the Storm mentions a group known as "the Wehttam." The context leaves unclear whether the term refers to a sentient species native to Wehttam or simply acts as a demonym for the inhabitants of the world. Wehttam is Matthew backwards.
